item.description:
Fun Meetup Presents a Vacation in a Weekend , Join us for an Amazing Weekend !!!

Advance Reservations Required, Weekend usually sells out before 6pm Friday !!!

Join us for a Vacation in a weekend !!!

Getaway vacation includes all meals, wine with dinner, all sports and activities with pro instruction, sports equipment, nightly entertainment, and lodging.

From Socializing , to Relaxing, Partying, Dancing, Drinking, to all Sports (Swimming, Softball, VolleyBall, Basketball, Tennis, ETC) , Fun Classes ( Yoga, Zumba and for females either a Pole Dancing Class or a Girls Night out Class), Camp Fire, Live Music, Great Food, Wine Tasting, Waterskiing, Etc

Any questions, call / text 917-868-4268,, Sign up online at http://FunMeetupGetaway.com or call 917-868-4268, Mention FunMeetup when booking to save $ and Get a Free Drinks Book!

Join us for Fun !!!

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: Fun Meetup Presents a Vacation in a Weekend , Join us for an Amazing Weekend !!!
